attributes.action: Abolish or reduce the amount of Tax we pay on our company Pension.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: after working and paying our taxs all our working lives, it is unfair that we still have to pay income tax on company pension, which we have paid into to  support our standard of living in our retirement years, and not have to ask for help from the state.
